entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 03:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Rain or snow late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
